description: In http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/support-matrix.html, 'VLAN networking' support for Hyper-V is marked as not supported, which is misguided since we can use VLAN networking for Hyper-V now.
title: Update hypervisor support matrix document: Hyper-V already supports VLAN networking

comments.content: In http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/support-matrix.html, 'VLAN networking' support for Hyper-V is marked as not supported, which is misguided since we can use VLAN networking for Hyper-V now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~llxing

comments.content:
@Lily Xing:

Since you are set as assignee, I switch the status to "In Progress".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
